ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
des: "This pasta is quick and easy to make!  You can use any different kind of noodles you would like.  Serve in bowls with some garlic bread."
ins:
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
In large saucepan over medium heat, combine mushroom soup, processed cheese, butter, milk, garlic powder, salt and pepper.  Stir until cheese is melted.  Stir in noodles and heat through.
